PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08662021-08-11ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActWage Earner Protection Program Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wage Earner Protection Program Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WAGE EARNER PROTECTION PROGRAM REGULATIONS (WEPP) in order to (1) enable earlier WEPP payments when an employer engages in liquidating restructuring proceedings; (2) extend coverage to individuals if their employer enters formal insolvency proceedings in another country; (3) eliminate the 6.82% WEPP offset (a mandatory 6.82% deduction from all WEPP payments); and (4) update the payment of trustee and receiver fees and expenses for low asset insolvencies so that more individuals can access WEPP.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0196 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Wage Earner Protection Program Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the WAGE EARNER PROTECTION PROGRAM REGULATIONS (WEPP) in order to (1) enable earlier WEPP payments when an employer engages in liquidating restructuring proceedings; (2) extend coverage to individuals if their employer enters formal insolvency proceedings in another country; (3) eliminate the 6.82% WEPP offset (a mandatory 6.82% deduction from all WEPP payments); and (4) update the payment of trustee and receiver fees and expenses for low asset insolvencies so that more individuals can access WEPP.
